name: Penne with Basil Cashew Pesto, Asparagus and Red Bell Pepper
description: A super easy penne pasta dish made with basil cashew pesto, asparagus and red bell pepper. A great, quick meal for weeknights. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup penne cooked according to instructions
1  green chili or dried red chili pepper ((we like a bit of spice))

recipeInstructions.text: For the pesto, wash the basil and add to blender and blend for a minute
recipeInstructions.name: For the pesto, wash the basil and add to blender and blend for a minute

recipeInstructions.text: In a small pan, add a tablespoon of olive oil. Keep at low heat and add garlic cloves and green chili. Let cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small pan, add a tablespoon of olive oil. Keep at low heat and add garlic cloves and green chili. Let cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cashews and let cook for another minute or 2.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cashews and let cook for another minute or 2.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this mixture to the blender and blend. Keep adding olive oil to get a smooth paste. My blender always gets me a coarse paste, so I added a little water as well, since I was going to use up the pesto within the week, or freeze it in ice cubes! Adjust chilis, garlic and basil by taste. This pesto is very forgiving, so play with it!. For basil mint pesto, I use about half cup mint.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add regular oil and the halved/sliced asparagus(for quicker cooking) and saute for 5-8 minutes on medium low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add regular oil and the halved/sliced asparagus(for quicker cooking) and saute for 5-8 minutes on medium low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic and red bell pepper rings and olive oil and saute for another 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic and red bell pepper rings and olive oil and saute for another 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cooked penne or any pasta of choice and pesto and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cooked penne or any pasta of choice and pesto and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust for salt and pepper. We needed just a teeny bit of salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust for salt and pepper. We needed just a teeny bit of salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh chopped tomatoes!
